sentence.Network_en: The vile person shall be no more called liberal , nor the churl said to be bountiful.
sentence.Network_cn: 愚顽人不再称为高明 、 吝啬人不再称为大方.

sentence.Network_en: He must have had some upsdowns in life to make him such a churl .
sentence.Network_cn: 他一定经历了很多起起落落才形成了变成了如此粗鄙的人。

sentence.Network_en: He must have had some ups and downs in life to make him such a churl.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一生一定经历过一些坎坷,才使他变成这么一个粗暴的人.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English ceorl, of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch kerel and German Kerl 'fellow', also to carl

means.word_mean: 1. a crude uncouth ill-bred person lacking culture or refinement
2. a selfish person who is unwilling to give or spend

sentences.en: The vile person shall be no more called liberal, nor the churl said to be bountiful.
sentences.cn: 愚顽人不再称为高明、吝啬人不再称为大方。
